fu.util

Class ConcaveHullGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • fu.util.ConcaveHullGenerator

  • public class ConcaveHullGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper to the opensphere ConcaveHull algorithm, with the following simplifications.
    • there exist calls that avoid any reference to JTS in the method calls
    • only points can be passed to the algorithm (opensphere allows arbitrary Geometry objects)
    • the result is the exterior ring (i.e. the outside border) of the hull (opensphere allows multipolies with holes)

    • Method Detail

      • concaveHullJTS

        public static Geometry concaveHullJTS(java.util.ArrayList<double[]> points,
                                      double alpha)
        Computes a concave hull from a list of points.
        Parameters:
        points - the points
        alpha - indicates how much the hull is "bended" into the point cloud, expressed in dimensions of point coordinates
        Returns:
        a JTS Geometry of the border

      • concaveHull

        public static java.util.ArrayList<double[]> concaveHull(java.util.ArrayList<double[]> points,
                                                        double alpha)
        Computes a concave hull from a list of points.
        Parameters:
        points - the points
        alpha - indicates how much the hull is "bended" into the point cloud, expressed in dimensions of point coordinates
        Returns:
        a list of border points (closed, last and first point identical)

      • concaveMultiHull

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<double[]>> concaveMultiHull(java.util.ArrayList<double[]> points,
                                                                                  double alpha)
        Computes a concave hull from a list of points. If points can be clustered, the multiple concave hulls are computed from point clusters.
        Parameters:
        points - the points (this list is destroyed during the call)
        alpha - indicates how much the hull is "bended" into the point cloud, expressed in dimensions of point coordinates
        Returns:
        a list of lists of border points (closed, last and first point identical), for each cluster one border point list

      • concaveMultiHullJTS

        public static Geometry concaveMultiHullJTS(java.util.ArrayList<double[]> points,
                                           double alpha)
        Computes a concave hull from a list of points. If points can be clustered, the multiple concave hulls are computed from point clusters.
        Parameters:
        points - the points (this list is destroyed during the call)
        alpha - indicates how much the hull is "bended" into the point cloud, expressed in dimensions of point coordinates
        Returns:
        a JTS Geometry of the border (a GeometryCollection if clusters were detected)
